ygData.subject: Re: helping out other-- was twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: As a newbie to everquest (I m a lvl 10 druid...when do I NOT become a newbie? ;) ), I have not accepted nor asked for twinking. I m still in just leather
ygData.messageBody:
As a newbie to everquest (I'm a lvl 10
druid...when do I NOT become a newbie? ;) ), I have not
accepted nor asked for twinking. I'm still in just leather
armor, can barely scape up enough plat to buy
spells...in fact, I've still not bought some level 5 spells
due to this fact. But, it requires me to learn the
game by using limited resources wisely...oh, I did
play another druid as my first character and did
scrounge 14 gold off of him and a cloth belt and a
backpack before deleting him, but I think most would
agree, that's about like drinking an O'Douls and saying
that you had a beer...<br><br>Anyhow, the game is
great. I do enjoy the ROLE-playing aspect of being a
druid...I was even thrilled to be the highest level
character in an orc-hill run (I was level 9) and considered
the "TANK" of the group...ha!<br><br>Take
care,<br><br>Jim<br>CoJim - Druid of the 10th season, Prexus server.
